flawed_nl_solution:
He cuts his grass 4-2=<<4-2=2>>2 inches
So he gets it cut every 2/0.5=<<2/0.5=4>>4 months
That means he gets it cut 12/4=<<12/4=3>>3 times a year
So he pays 100*3=$<<100*3=3000>>3000 per year
#### 3000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 300, not 3000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
